text: Jai Kanhaiya Lal Ki was a Hindi television comedy soap opera that premiered on 1 January 2018 and aired on Star Bharat. The show stars Vishal Vashishtha and Shweta Mou Bhattacharya in lead roles. The Show went off air on 26 May 2018 and it was replaced by Muskaan. ==Quick facts== Subheadings Information Name Jai Kannaya lal ki Type Television Series Country India Genre Comedy/Mythology Director Krishna Kumar Producer Siddharth Kumar Tiwary Production house Swastik Production Premiered 1 January 2018 Original Network Life Ok (now Star Bharat) Running Time 20-40 Minutes Episodes 180+ Based on Bhagvat Geeta Category:Hindi-language television series Category:2010s Indian television series Category:2018 Indian television series debuts Category:2018 Indian television series endings
title: Jai Kanhaiya Lal Ki
